name: Shock Cats
description:
Made a platformer game for Mini Jam 127: Cats².

Two square cats got into the woolly world and wanted to eat. With the static electricity generated by friction with the wool floor, they are gravitate towards each other, which helps them on their way to get a tasty cat food.

Controls:

  • AD to Move
  • SPACE to Switch cats
  • RMB to Gravitate towards each other
  • R to Restart
